1.title: Mark McGrath and Stick Figure
1.plot: Pop Punk Singer Mark McGrath (Sugar Ray) plays the role of mentor, as he is paired with upbeat roots reggae band, Stick Figure. Mark shares advice and support before the band makes their live broadcast debut. Will the mentor take the stage for a once in-a-lifetime collaboration? Find out on Breaking Band.

2.title: Sebastian Bach and Santa Cruz
2.plot: Metal Icon Sebastian Bach (Skid Row) plays the role of mentor, as he is paired with Finland rock sensation, Santa Cruz. Sebastian shares advice and support before the band makes their live broadcast debut. Will the mentor take the stage for a once in-a-lifetime collaboration? Find out on Breaking Band.

3.title: Belinda Carlisle and Sick of Sarah
3.plot: Pop Sensation Belinda Carlisle (The Go-Go's) plays the role of mentor, as she is paired with up and coming all female punk band, Sick Of Sarah. Belinda shares advice and support before the band makes their live broadcast debut. Will the mentor take the stage for a once in-a-lifetime collaboration? Find out on Breaking Band.

4.title: Moby and RUNAGROUND
4.plot: Electronic Music Icon Moby plays the role of mentor, as he is paired with up and coming pop melody artist RUNAGROUND. Moby shares advice and support before the band makes their live broadcast debut. Will the mentor take the stage for a once in-a-lifetime collaboration? Find out on Breaking Band.

5.title: Robin Zander and Set the Charge
5.plot: Hard Rock legend Robin Zander (Cheap Trick) plays the role of mentor, as he is paired with up and coming studio rock band, Set The Charge. Robin shares advice and support before the band makes their live broadcast debut. Will the mentor take the stage for a once in-a-lifetime collaboration? Find out on Breaking Band.

6.title: Dave Navarro and Andie Case
6.plot: Alternative Rock Guitarist Dave Navarro (Jane's Addiction/Red Hot Chilli Peppers) plays the role of mentor, as he is paired with up and coming pop solo artist, Andie Case. Dave shares advice and support before she makes her live broadcast debut. Will the mentor take the stage for a once in-a-lifetime collaboration? Find out on Breaking Band.

imdb.plot outline: BREAKING BAND, a new original series from AXS TV. The six-episode 30-minute documentary style reality series places legendary musical artists into the role of mentors, pairing them with up-and-coming artists for a once in a lifetime collaboration. This seasons mentors are musician and TV personality Mark McGrath (Sugar Ray), pop queen Belinda Carlisle (The Go-Go's), rock legend Robin Zander (Cheap Trick), award winning producer and techno icon Moby, metal master Sebastian Bach (Skid Row), and guitar idol Dave Navarro (Janes Addiction). As mentors, their role is to share advice and to support the breaking artists debut live performance - potentially even taking the stage to join them for the encore to make broadcast history. The series was shot at YouTube Space LA.
